mapper.select: select us.id uId, us.account, us.password, ro.id rId, ro.role, ro.description rDescription, pe.id pId, pe.permission, pe.description pDescription from sys_user us left join sys_users_roles ur on us.id = ur.user_id and ur.is_valid=1 left join sys_roles ro on ur.role_id=ro.id and ro.is_valid=1 left join sys_roles_permissions rp on ro.id = rp.role_id and rp.is_valid=1 left join sys_permissions pe on rp.permission_id=pe.id and pe.is_valid=1 where us.account=#{account} and us.is_valid=1
